view.name: EAM_VIRT_PLAT_VIEW
view.query: SELECT p.*, v.RESOURCE_ID, PROCESS_ID, PHYSICAL_ID FROM EAM_PLATFORM p, EAM_RESOURCE r, EAM_RESOURCE_TYPE rt, EAM_VIRTUAL v WHERE rt.name = 'covalentEAMPlatform' AND r.resource_type_id = rt.id AND r.instance_id = p.id AND r.id = v.resource_id

view.name: EAM_VIRT_SVR_VIEW
view.query: SELECT s.*, v.RESOURCE_ID, PROCESS_ID, PHYSICAL_ID FROM EAM_SERVER s, EAM_RESOURCE r, EAM_RESOURCE_TYPE rt, EAM_VIRTUAL v WHERE rt.name = 'covalentEAMServer' AND r.resource_type_id = rt.id AND r.instance_id = s.id AND r.id = v.resource_id

view.name: EAM_VIRT_SVC_VIEW
view.query: SELECT s.*, v.RESOURCE_ID, PROCESS_ID, PHYSICAL_ID FROM EAM_SERVICE s, EAM_RESOURCE r, EAM_RESOURCE_TYPE rt, EAM_VIRTUAL v WHERE rt.name = 'covalentEAMService' AND r.resource_type_id = rt.id AND r.instance_id = s.id AND r.id = v.resource_id
